com.logitopia.jmortar.core.persistence.dao.builder

Class HibernateDACBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.logitopia.jmortar.core.persistence.dao.builder.HibernateDACBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DACBuilder<HibernateResource>

    @Component(value="hibernateDACBuilder")
public final class HibernateDACBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements DACBuilder<HibernateResource>
    Creating a DAC Builder that creates components for the Hibernate implementation.

                                                    QueryFactory queryFactory)
        Build the readable data access component.
        Specified by:
        buildReadableDAC in interface DACBuilder<HibernateResource>
        Parameters:
        hibernateResource - The resource to use to build the readable DAC.
        keyFields - The key fields on the model.
        queryFactory - The factory that will be used to build queries for the persistence method.
        Returns:
        The complete readable DAC.

      • buildReadableDAC

        public ReadableDataAccessComponent buildReadableDAC(HibernateResource hibernateResource,
                                                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> keyFields,
                                                    QueryFactory queryFactory,
                                                    java.util.Map queryItemBuilders)
        Build the readable data access component.
        Specified by:
        buildReadableDAC in interface DACBuilder<HibernateResource>
        Parameters:
        hibernateResource - The resource to use to build the readable DAC.
        keyFields - The key fields on the model.
        queryFactory - The factory that will be used to build queries for the persistence method.
        queryItemBuilders - The query item builders that must be used to construct the DAC.
        Returns:
        The complete readable DAC.
